post.author: Art.of.War
post.body: Where can i find doom3 map editor software? Know any free sites thanx

post.author: Dinky
post.body:
Not trying to be mean, I just wish n00bies would use the search button a little more. Whether it be here at Doom 3 World or Google. This is a pretty common and irritating noob question. I have no problem with n00bs, just repetitive questions that people are able to found out the answers about on their own.

Anyway, I've talked about that too much, go here to learn how to start DoomEDIT (IT COMES WITH DOOM 3): http://www.iddevnet.com/doom3/editor.php

post.author: BloodRayne
rich_is_bored
post.body:
Don't use the search feature. It's crap.

You'll turn up dozens of pages worth of results and most of it won't be usefull because you're not familiar enough with editing to know what words to search for.

Instead, visit http://www.modwiki.net. The same information is there and it's organized. And best of all, the search feature doesn't suck.

After all that, if you can't find an answer to a question or would just like to discuss something then post here.

post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body:
rich_is_bored wrote:
Don't use the search feature. It's crap.


only because it stop searches if you hit the "search" button to soon after eachother.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
BloodRayne wrote:

Great!

post.author: evilartist
post.body:
BloodRayne wrote:


Damn it! I was going to post that, but you beat me to it.

"Can someone tell me how to get my breathing skill up!?"

post.body: Don't forget "How do I shot web?". \-0_0--/
